item.title: Deploying with Shinyproxy and Golem
item.description: After hitting golem::add_docker_shinyproxy I had to edit the dockerfile and replace the last line with â€¦ Loading golem as a remote did not work so I fetched it from github. The full working dockerfile is FROM rocker/tidyverse:3.6.0 RUN R -e 'install.packages("remotes")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_github("r-lib/remotes", ref = "97bbf81")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_cran("attempt")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_cran("DT")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_cran("glue")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_github("ThinkR-open/golem")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_cran("htmltools")' RUN R -e 'remotes::install_cran("shiny")' COPY communitymap_*.

item.title: Community Map
item.description: The Austrian Digitisation Agency commissioned a stakeholder mapping of actors pushing digitisation forward in Austria. The Community Map, a Shiny app, shows data collected from a snowballing survey in which key actors identified their main partners and provided information about their R&D, business and data sharing links.
